com.swirl

Class ContentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.swirl.ContentActivity

  • public class ContentActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    The ContentActivity class is the default activity class for displayed content in the Swirl. It manages the ActionBar content, menu and history view.
